tool_description: Calculates proper ventilation requirements based on room size, moisture load, and usage patterns to prevent mold and maintain air quality.

usage_frequency.description: Expected usage: light, moderate, or heavy

error_messages: Invalid room volume: Room volume must be greater than 50 cubic feet.
Invalid usage frequency: Use light, moderate, or heavy.
Insufficient ventilation capacity: Calculated requirements exceed standard residential fan capacities.
usage: Input room volume and fixtures present. Optionally specify usage frequency. The tool calculates minimum ventilation requirements and recommends appropriate fan specifications.

minimum_cfm.description: Minimum required airflow in cubic feet per minute
